ensembl
Class GetEnsembleDna

java.lang.Object
  server.Domain
      ensembl.GetEnsembleDna

public class GetEnsembleDna
extends Domain

This class accesses the Ensembl Genome Browser to retrieve DNA sequences from specified chromosome segments of the genome of the organism.

Version:
$Id: GetEnsembleDna.html,v 1.24 2009/08/14 21:13:34 tizatt Exp $

Arjun Chandrasekhar
